Method.name: connect
Method.Implementation: s reply = ..bridge.connect(url) if (..bridge.isException(reply)) throw ##class(Exception).%New(reply,"on connect to "_url)

Method.name: disconnect
Method.Implementation:
quit:'$isObject(..bridge)
s reply = ..bridge.disconnect() if (..bridge.isException(reply)) throw ##class(Exception).%New(reply) s ..bridge = $$$NULLOREF
